column2: 공산당의 목표는 더이상 우리가 아닙니다. 우리의 이념이 변했듯이, 충성의 대상도 변해야 합니다. 내전이 계속되고 있습니다!
column3: The goals of the Communists are no longer our own. As our ideology has changed, so must our allegiance. The civil war continues!
Abandon the Beiyang

column2: 북양군의 목표는 더이상 우리가 아닙니다. 우리의 이념이 변했듯이, 충성의 대상도 변해야 합니다. 내전이 계속되고 있습니다!
column3: The goals of the Beiyang Army are no longer our own. As our ideology has changed, so must our allegiance. The civil war continues!
Leader of the Kuomintang

column2: 국민당의 맹주 자리는 우리에게 달렸습니다. 중국 국민당에 승리를!
column3: It falls to us to take the mantle of Kuomintang leadership. Victory for Nationalist China!
Leader of the Beiyang

column2: 수도를 장악하면 정부에 대한 정통성을 주장할 수 있으며, 중국의 진정한 통치자로서 국제적 인정을 받을 수 있습니다.
column3: With control over Beijing, we may assume leadership over the Beiyang government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.
Leader of the Chinese Communists

column2: 수도를 장악하면 정부에 대한 정통성을 주장할 수 있으며, 중국의 진정한 통치자로서 국제적 인정을 받을 수 있습니다.
column3: With control over Beijing, we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.
Join the Kuomintang

column2: 우리는 베이징을 장악하고 있으며 국민당의 대의를 도울 수 있는 위치에 있습니다. 우리는 그들의 군대와 합류해야 합니다.
column3: Now that we control Beijing, we are in a position to aid the cause of Nationalist China. We must join our forces with theirs, for the good of all!
Reunification of Nationalist China

column2: 수도를 장악하면 정부에 대한 정통성을 주장할 수 있으며, 중국의 진정한 통치자로서 국제적 인정을 받을 수 있습니다.
column3: With control over the capital, we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.
Reunification of China

column2: 수도를 장악하면 정부에 대한 정통성을 주장할 수 있으며, 중국의 진정한 통치자로서 국제적 인정을 받을 수 있습니다.
column3: With control over the capital, we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.
Chinese Reunification

column2: 수도를 장악하면 정부에 대한 정통성을 주장할 수 있으며, 중국의 진정한 통치자로서 국제적 인정을 받을 수 있습니다.
column3: With control over the capital, we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.
The Unequal Treaty

column2: 청제국이 밀리고 있습니다. 이제 우리는 그들보다 협상에서 유리한 위치에 있습니다.
column3: The Qing Empire is at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table, and wrangle concessions of both land and reparations -- provided they are willing, of course.
The Unequal Treaty

column2: 태평천국이 밀리고 있습니다. 이제 우리는 그들보다 협상에서 유리한 위치에 있습니다.
column3: The Heavenly Kingdom is at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table, and wrangle concessions of both land and reparations -- provided they are willing, of course.
Form Dravidistan

column2: 드라비다인들은 우리의 깃발 아래 단결해 제국주의 세력의 인도 침략에 항거해야 합니다.
column3: We must unite the Dravidian people under a single flag, to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.
Form Rajputana

column2: 라지푸타나인들은 우리의 깃발 아래 단결해 제국주의 세력의 인도 침략에 항거해야 합니다.
column3: We must unite the Rajput people under a single flag, to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.
Form Baluchistan

column2: 발루치인들을 해방해 우리의 깃발 아래 단결하도록 해야 합니다.
column3: The Baluchi people must be liberated and united under a single flag -- ours.
Revive the Durrani Empire

column2: 파슈툰족의 영토를 모두 손에 넣어 잃어버렸던 제국을 되찾읍시다!
column3: With Pashtun lands once again back in our hands, the empire of the Pashtuns can once again rise and reclaim that which was lost!
Claim Greater Bengal

column2: 벵골 제국은 한때 인도 동부의 많은 부분을 지배했습니다. 지금이 다시 한번 대벵골을 주장할 때입니다. 제국주의 세력에 일격을 가합시다!
column3: The Bengal Empire once ruled over much of eastern India, and the time has come to once again restake our claim. We must strike a blow against the forces of imperialism!
Embrace the Pashtuns

column2: 시크 제국은 세속적이고 관대한 국가입니다. 우리는 옛 파슈툰 영토를 수용할 것이며, 이전보다 더 강한 국가를 건설할 것입니다.
column3: The Sikh Empire is a secular, tolerant state. We shall embrace the Pashtun lands under our dominion, and together forge a nation even stronger than before.
Embrace the Sindi

column2: 시크 제국은 세속적이고 관대한 국가입니다. 우리는 옛 신드 영토를 수용할 것이며, 이전보다 더 강한 국가를 건설할 것입니다.
column3: The Sikh Empire is a secular, tolerant state. We shall embrace the Sindi lands under our dominion, and together forge a nation even stronger than before.
Embrace the Avadhi

column2: 시크 제국은 세속적이고 관대한 국가입니다. 우리는 옛 아바디 영토를 수용할 것이며, 이전보다 더 강한 국가를 건설할 것입니다.
column3: The Sikh Empire is a secular, tolerant state. We shall embrace the Avadhi lands under our dominion, and together forge a nation even stronger than before.

column2: 5710- $YEAR$은(는) $COUNTRY$ 상원에서 $YEAR$년에 제정한 법입니다. 이 법은 "모든 디아스포라 당사자들에게는 이민자로서 이 나라로 올 권리가 있습니다"고 선언합니다. 다른 약속들 중에서 경제적, 사회적 장려금을 포함하는 예산이 새로운 법에 생겼습니다. 이 모든 것은 잠재적인 이민자들을 목표로 하며, 가능한 모든 노력을 기울여 디아스포라 동포들을 고향으로 데려오려 합니다.

column3: Russian Setup

column2: 오스만 제국의 종교적 소수자들이 문제를 일으키고 있습니다.
뇌샤텔에 대한 다가오는 위기는 확대되지 않았고 우리에게 유리하게 해결됐습니다. 독일은 스위스의 필수적인 부분이 된 칸톤(주)에 대한 그들의 영유권 주장을 철회했습니다.
아군이 패배하고 군비에 제약이 가해지자 강대국들은 자신들이 시행한 무역규제를 해제하는 데 더욱 열심입니다.
세계는 아직 위기를 맞을 준비가 되지 않았습나다..
우리 이웃 중 하나가 현대 중앙은행 체계를 받아들였습니다.

column3: Token Localization
Token Localization
Token Localization
Token Localization
Token Localization
Token Localization
Token Localization
Token Localization
Token Localization
Token Localization

column2: Restore the House of Rasheed to the Arabian throne

During the first twenty years of the 19th century the Arabian Peninsula saw a long-running series of wars as the Saudis and their allies sought to unite the peninsula under their rule. While the Al Rasheed rallied the majority of other tribes to their side the effort proved futile, and by 1821 Ha'il was captured and the House of Rasheed forced to flee to Al Haasa. We have now finally revenged our ancestors and rule the Arabia in the name of Allah.
Build a Statue for Edward IV in Fort Lothere

Years ago, Edward IV, King of Beornia, has helped us install order in our country, when the vile Monarchist regime had seized power. It is past time we paid tribute to this great man, who stood up for our security and traditions in times of peril.

The Beornians have always tried to expand into the Mapuche lands. But their harsh resistance led to a treaty that delimited the border around the river Graham. But now the Beornians have the advantage on the Mapuche tribes and it is needed to secure these lands before the Incans do the same.

A proposal has been brought forth to finally push into the southern lands of Araucania and pacify them once and for all. The Mapuche have refused for centuries to accept our rule and it is our duty to spread the glory of the Inca in the Southern Andes
The vast jungles along the Amazon river are void and non-occupied. From our bases in Para we can claim the are and take the territory for ourselves
The vast jungles along the Amazon river are void and non-occupied. From our bases in Para we can claim the are and take the territory for ourselves
We truly are the dominant power in the area and Mexico will be forced to back his claims !
Lotharingia is now forced to recognize the inclusion of Atlantia in the Amazonian Federation. All hail Amazonia !
With Atlantia integrated in the Federation many in the high spheres have asked for expansion into Lotharingia. Many plans have been proposed but which one will get the vote of the Parliament ?
Now that we have conquered territories where reside Guaranis, we can integrate them into the Federation to counterbalance the Lotharian influence in the area, a move the Lotharians won't like.

Now we are in control of Libreville and Nouvelle-Alsace, we should assemble the Lotharian representatives to try to make them accept our rule. However should they refuse, it would be an action that could spark a revolt in the new territories...

With our control over the new states of the Federation established, we should assemble the Lotharian representatives to try to make them accept our rule. However should they refuse, it would be an action that could spark a revolt in the new territories...

With our complete control over what was Lotharingia, we should assemble the Lotharian representatives to try to make them accept our rule. However should they refuse, it would be an action that could spark a revolt in the new territories...

Despite the wars with Lotharingia, we now stand proud as the dominant power of Ameriga. We can now unify the two former Frankish colonies into a single state that will rivalize with the Great European Powers. Long Live Ameriga !

Despite the wars with Amazonia, we now stand proud as the dominant power of Ameriga. We can now unify the two former Frankish colonies into a single state that will rivalize with the Great European Powers. Long Live Ameriga !
North of the vast Amazonian jungle is located the old Spanish territories of Guyana. With the forest an integral part of our country we have to act and annex the border to avoid any threats to it.

With our control of Eastern Ameriga complete and secured some of our politics have talked to integrate Beornia into the Federation. They are likely to refuse but their small size will let us integrate them by force if necessary

With the old Beornian capital in our hands and their country under our control we can call a council to try to integrate the Beornians into the Federation. Should they refuse it would mean countless years of opposition from the natives
Our Federation now extends from the Caribbean to the Pampas ! But until we secure Granada and Andagoya, we won't truly be the dominant power of Ameriga !
With Cartagena de Indias in our hands and we can call a council to try to integrate the Granadans into the Federation.
The Congress of Camelot might have backfired but we ahve taken steps to really integrate the Beornians and assure them that they are true citizens of the Federation.

Despite our efforts the Granadans have refused to accept our rule over the Northern lands of the continent. With our rule secured over all our claims, it is time to make them true citizens of the Federation.

Ameriga is at last truly united! From Cartagena to Port-Libert? from the Falklands to the Chaco, our flag is hoisted high! The next century will be our time to shine, but for that we need the weary of the Old World!

We have abolished slavery, but the former slaves continue to be excluded from society. We would have everything to gain by making them full citizens, ensuring their prosperity and our national cohesion.

We have abolished slavery, but the former slaves continue to be excluded from society. We would have everything to gain by making them full citizens, ensuring their prosperity and our national cohesion.
France Antarctique has failed to impose their will on our people. We ahve stood against their agressions and shall never be part of the same state as them!

New Amsterdam lacks a defining monument which would show its wealth and new status on the international stage. Designs have been approved for a statue representing the allegory of Liberty with a Phrygian cap to be built in the bay. It would be an important work, one that would show the power of our industry to the rest of the world.

Camelot has been the capital of the Kingdom of Beornia since the crowning of the first king Edward I in 1658. The most important city of the country is still a backwards city compared to the rest of the civilized capitals. The city was never really planned and the feudality system that endured here for centuries has led to a poor development. Outside of the Royal Castle and the Alfredian place in the harbor there is a lot of work to do to ensure that Camelot can continue the legacy of the Arthurian legend and grow to be one of the best cities of the world.

The colonization of Patagonia has seen both our settlers and Incans compete for the New-Cornish lands and it has been deemed important to settle the situation with a treaty recognizing each other claims on the area.

The New-Cornish lands have been one of the primary centres of interest of our country in the last past years. With our power unmatched by the pesky Incans it is time we force them to cede all lands that they would have colonized south of their Antisuyu area.
We have competed with Beornia over Mapuche lands and it is time we force them to cede their colonies in the area to us, the natural overlords of the area.

For centuries now, the crown of Aragon has been a dominant power on the Italian peninsula. We are now strong enough to strengthen our rule over Italy and proclaim the Dual Kingdom of Aragon and Italy! But let us beware, the other European Great Powers might not take the news kindly...
We now have enough power to demand the end of North Italian autonomy. The Milanese are likely to refuse our ultimatum thus leading to a civil war but we have enough power to win.
With the end of North Italian autonomy we can now integrate them into the social fabric of our empire. This will please all Italians but will anger Catalans and deeply anger Castillans.
Venice - while distinct from the rest of the country - is Italian and thus should be a part of our realm.\nWith our control over Northern Italy cemented we can now focus on making it so.

As we are the heirs of the Roman Empire, in our increased power after the end of North Italian autonomy and North Italian intergration we can now proclaim the Latin Empire and claim the Western Mediterranean.
Provence has held for such a long time because of our protection. Now that our Mediterranean ambitions have been stated a peaceful annexation might be possible with sufficient diplomatic pressure.

We have subdued all other Arabian rulers and expelled the foreign invaders from their courts. The entire Arabian Peninsula kneels before You. Let our dynasty rules the Holy Lands for thousand years by the Grace of Allah.
With Arcadia doubtlessly dominated by our country, we can now establish a country with a more fitting name.
With Arcadia doubtlessly dominated by our country, we can now establish a country with a more fitting name.
With Arcadia doubtlessly dominated by our country, we can now establish a country with a more fitting name.
In our quest for the unification of Arcadia, we have fully incorporated the former lands of Vinland. We can now try to persuade the local population to embrace the Arcadian Dream.
Hold a Conference over New Burgundy

In our quest for the unification of Arcadia, we have fully incorporated the former lands of the Confederation of Belgica. We can now try to persuade the local population to embrace the Arcadian Dream.
In our quest for the unification of Arcadia, we have fully incorporated the former lands of Plantagenia. We can now try to persuade the local population to embrace the Arcadian Dream.
In our quest for the unification of Arcadia, we have fully incorporated the former lands of Lusitania. We can now try to persuade the local population to embrace the Arcadian Dream.

Our country made impossible possible. Where once were petty squabling realms of Plantagenia, New Burgundy and Vinland now resides only Arcadia - the new paradise on Earth. It is now save  to declare Pan-Arcadianism to be a dream come true.

As Arcadia gradually changed to be an equal federation rather than a hegemony of one of its cultures over the others, voices all around the country call for a discussion over founding a new capital representative of the recently found unity. Maybe it is the time to hear these calls?

Even though we haven't been able to persuade everyone that accepting the rule of Arcadia is the best thing to do, we are now in control of the former territories of the constituent countries in their entirety. With our citizens experiencing freedom and peace never to be seen before, they now could change their mind?

The Venitian colonists who settled in Athesia have been restless since our takeover of the peninsula. Many share the same values as other Arcadians and if we make the right efforts they will be integrated without problems!

The island of Kuba has seen the local settlers develop differently from both the Colombians and the Spanish. The island being in the center of the Caribbean Sea has seen countless traders land in Habana and Santiago and the local plantations are still profitable. Thus it could be easy to ensure our rule on the island by recognizing some autonomy and make the locals accept our rule.

The Southern Islands, as they are called in Scandinavian, are home to an important population, one that has grown restless since our occupation of the islands began. They share many similarities with us and with the proper mesures taken we can easily make them accept our rule!

The unification of Arcadia has led to a great increase of immigrants arriving in our ports. The tension between the former hostile communities of the continent is not helping the new people to integrate efficiently in our country. Thus it was proposed to claim all territories which are currently not fully settled by the Sanbao government in exchange of a generous subsidy.
Now that we have excavation rights for our expedition, we should establish a National Museum in our capital to house and display the artifacts we plunder--- er, uncover.

The Valley of the Kings, Egypt, is a potentially endless source of new archeological discoveries. By petitioning the Egyptian government for a monopoly to carry out excavations in The Valley of the Kings, we can ensure that we make these fantastic discoveries, rather than another Great Power.
Since we control Luxor, we can send an expedition to The Valley of The Kings to conduct archeological excavations. Discoveries of Egyptian tombs could increase our prestige.

When the Panama Canal was planned, several expeditions were sent into the depths of Central America. The inhabitants of the deep jungles of Yucatan told them stories of ruined cities and ancient treasures. What precious artifacts may be waiting in the depths of the jungle? We should outfit an expedition and seek permission to explore these ruins--- for the advancement of science, naturally!

When the Panama Canal was planned, several expeditions were sent into the depths of Central America. The inhabitants of the deep jungles of Yucatan told them stories of ruined cities and ancient treasures. What precious artifacts may be waiting in the depths of the jungle? We should outfit an expedition and explore these ruins--- for the advancement of science, naturally! And since we control the region, we can begin directly.

Since the rediscovery of the buried city of Pompeii in the 18th century, treasure-hunters, tomb raiders and adventurers have searched for valuable artefacts in the old Roman civitas. A new generation of archaeologists, diligent and experienced in new techniques and with a broader consciousness of scientific approaches, awaits to start new excavations. Giuseppe Fiorelli---one of those archaeologists, and a patriot, too---will develop a new kind of conservation and excavation in the Campanian fields, from which our nation and science will benefit.
The secrets of Ancient Greece await!
We shall not allow a few misguided locals prevent us from unlocking the secrets of history.
We must plunder the secrets of the ancient Minoan civilization, for the good of science.
We must plunder the secrets of the ancient Minoan civilization, for the good of science. It matters not what the local government thinks.

Mesopotamia: the onetime home of Babylonia, Akkadia and Assyria holds great promise for archaeological discovery. We've moved beyond the old methods of tomb-raiding and amateur excavations--- we should outfit a modern expedition and seek permission to explore these lands. We might bring back a few trophies for the museum... and learn something along the way.

Mesopotamia: the onetime home of Babylonia, Akkadia and Assyria holds great promise for archaeological discovery. We've moved beyond the old methods of tomb-raiding and amateur excavations--- we should outfit a modern expedition and explore these lands. We might bring back a few trophies for the museum... and learn something along the way. And since we control the region, we can begin directly.

The greatest aspiration of the Kalmar Union has always been the complete control of the Baltic Sea. While the Scandinavians gained several holdings in the region, they still miss Prussia and the Lithuanian coast. Let us claim these areas for the glory of the Union !
With the rest of the Baltic coast firmly under our control it is time to complete our ambitions and take Lithuania from the Polish.
Even if we have lost Pomerania, they are still rightful Scandinavian lands. Let us proclaim it high and wide and let the Germans fear our coming back !

The Commonwealth has experienced a severe decay in the last century. Problems with the Sejm, foreign intervention and weakness of the government led to a near break-up of the Union. But now we have reasserted our status in the European Concert and rid ourselves from foreign intervention, we can centralize the state in Warsaw and retake our place in Eastern Europe !
Missing localisation. Please report to Divergences' developer.
Missing localisation. Please report to Divergences' developer.

The Livonians and Estonian people never truly enjoyed independence, being contested between the Commonwealth and Scandinavia. But in contrary to the Scandinavians, we have a tradition of accepting the local cultures and integrate in our state ! Long live the Polish rule of Livonia !

The Ruthenians constitute the most important ethnic group in the Commonwealth behind the Polish. Over the centuries, we have tried to integrate in our fabric, granting some of their nobles rights in the Sejm, encouraging the Uniate Church in spreading catholiscism. Now a new proposition has emerged to transform our state into a Polish-Lithuanian-Ruthenian Commonwealth but it needs the approval of the Ruthenian leaders
Missing localisation. Please report to Divergences' developer.
Missing localisation. Please report to Divergences' developer.

Despite all their attempts, the Bohemians could not stop our ambition. We control much of Northern Germany and it is our duty to help the Elbian people and accept them into our Union. Let us proclaim them brothers of the Scandinavians and use them to strenghten our state !

The Cossacks control large swaths of lands in the Commonwealth and obey only on paper to the orders of Warsaw. We can use our influence to take the whole Dniepr eastern bank and grow closer to the West and Kiev, the old capital of the Rus'
An independent Ruthenia does not serve well Mother Russia, we need to end their pathetic revendications and integrate them fully into our growing state.

Starting as a group of refugees without resources in a foreign land, we have become a powerful nation, recognised today as a Great Power. We now can challenge the Burgundian tyrants that expelled us from our lands, et work toward reconquering them!
The Free State of the Netherlands

Our hardy group of pioneers set out decades back to found a free Dutch state in the heart of Africa, we have accomplished far more: not only have we overcome our divisions to create the powerful Batavian state, but we have been able to free our brothers from the Burgundian domination! Today we proclaim the Free State of the Netherlands!

Starting as a group of refugees without resources in a foreign land, we have become a powerful nation, recognised today as a Great Power. We now can challenge the French tyrants that expelled us from our lands, et work toward reconquering them!
Expelled from green England by the Norman invaders centuries ago, today we have accomplished our fathers' dreams: England is ours once more!
Proclaim Beornia the Holy Britannian Empire
Instead of dreaming of reconquering the lands we left centuries ago, we must focus on our new sphere of interest - Ameriga. Let's forge an Empire yet unseen!

The Cape Duchy was established after the end of the German Wars and is the sole area we could take back from the old Boer colonies. The duke of the Cape has sent us many messages, urging us to enhance our position in the area to protect the colony we have allowed him to rule. Moreover, it seems that Africa is becoming interesting for Great Powers and it will be good for us to have a stronger position when the real colonization begins.
The Cape Colony is under our control. Now is the time to sit down with our former colonial masters and work out a peace deal that will see it transferred back into Boer hands.

Calais and the surrounding plains of Picardie were important places during the Hundred Years War. Sadly this territory was lost with Calais being surrendered to the Burgundian king during the Anglo-French wars of Religion. But with our troops having recaptured the closest land to England we could make the International Concert recognize our claim !
The French claim on the Free County of Burgundy is solid. Though we had to project our power through force, we can claim the ethernal right to these lands.
Our ground in the South started to shake꿾e need to secure ourselves by signing this treaty. It might be humiliating now, but it will be viewed as a right decision in the future.
We can extend our claims to the South through the creation of the Free Duchy of Geneve under our jurisdiction.
We can extend our rights to the South through using the claim of the Grand Duchy of Geneve.
We no longer have control of any of our territory in Europe and are no longer even recognized as a Great Power. Maybe it is time to admit defeat and give up our claim to Burgundy.
We have lost control over the Dutch heartlands and it seems wiser for us to go to Namur to prepare the reconquest!
The time of troubles has passed and now we have the control of the Netherlands in full we can go back to Anvers, the true capital of Burgundy!

Flanders have been the heart of the Dutch people since the Middle-Ages. The independence movement may have taken control of the Netherlands but until Antwerp and Brugge aren't in our control we can't seriously proclaim to be the Dutch state!
Let us rename the streets of our beloved provinces!
Now we have taken the Flanders, we will certainly give back their true names, Burgundian names, to the Flemish cities!

The Rhine River has been the official border of the Kingdom of Burgundy since the conquests of Charles the Bold of 1483, even if it would take time to integrate the various duchies and cities in the Burgundian state. While they never enjoyed the same relation the Dutch had with the Valois the Rhineland was not a rebellious area, that is until the German revolution. Ever since the contract between Burgundy and the Rhenish seemed to have been broken. Eventually with efficient policies of integration this trust can be rebuild as to secure the loyalty of the Rhineland to Anvers.
Building a canal between the Baltic and The North Sea would be a tremendous boon to our shipping, and we are in a position to build one in Kiel. Reserve at least 120,000 before starting construction.

One of the long standing problems for shipping on the Far Eastern and India trades has always been the need to round the African Cape in order to actually get there. By establishing a canal through the Suez, we will shorten the journey to Asia by days, as well as perform a wonderful feat of modern engineering. Reserve at least 330,000 before starting construction.

Proposals for a Canal across the Andagoya Isthmus probably date back to the first discovery of the area. Nowhere is the strip of land that unites the North and South American continents thinner than here, and, with the aid of modern engineering, we could shorten the travel time between the Atlantic and The Pacific by several days by building it. Reserve at least 190,000[SUB_A4]  before starting construction.

The Mongol Empire built by Temujin the Genghis Khan was divided among his four sons after his death. One of them was Chagatai. Many years have passed by and the only part of the Empire that survived was the Chagatai Khanate's successor - the Dzungar Khanate, the last heir to the Genghis's legacy. Today we completed the resurrection of the Empire under the green flag of Islam. Insha'Allah, let us rule China for ever!

The Mongol Empire built by Temujin the Genghis Khan was divided among his four sons after his death. Our branch continued to rule China but the Chinese traitors overthrew the Yuan dynasty and we had to flee to the steppes and struggle. But today the Empire lives again!

The Qing dynasty that united our lands launched an invasion of China under the leadership of the Kanxi Emperor. But his triumph was incomplete, as the accursed Ming resisted our push to the south. Now we have finished what he started, and our dynasty shall rule China for centuries to come!

After centuries of warfare following the invasion of the accursed Manchus, we have managed to bring unity back to China. It is time to claim for good the Mandate of Heaven, and reunify the ancient Chinese nation!
After centuries of isolation, we have returned to bring unity back to our motherland. Let us resurrect the glorious Chinese nation and move our capital back to the mainland!
Centuries ago our kings led great invasions to the fractured China. We have finished what they started and now our rulers will govern China in eternal peace under the guidance of the Awakened One.
Control of the Pearl River Delta

Amongst the Chinese states, we hold a special relationship with Taiping. This state while professing a deviant interpretation of the Holy Faith, is still Christian, a quality the others warring states don't have. Moreover, it is close to our base in Hainan from where we used to trade with China. We could propose to help them against their opponents in exchange for some ports in the area ...
With Nanjing under our control, we can dissolve the petty republic of Jiangsu.
With Pusan and Seoul under our control, we can end the Korean revolt.
With Mexico and Cartagena under our control we can end the war in the New World.
The Qing Empire is at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table, and wrangle concessions of both land and reparations-- provided they are willing, of course.
The Heavenly Kingdom is at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table, and wrangle concessions of both land and reparations-- provided they are willing, of course.
The Ming Empire is at disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table, and wrangle concessions of both land and reparation - provided they are willing of course...
Nanjing is at disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table, and wrangle concessions of both land and reparation - provided they are willing of course...
Thanks to our successful actions we have minimalized the impact of nobility on the government and Your rule over our country is now undisputed.
This should never be read outside of a localisation file.

With Spain driven out of our core lands, we can proclaim their dominion over Gran Colombia null and void, effectively ending the war. If Spain continues her senseless aggression against us, she will become a ruthless aggressor in the eyes of the world.
The idea of the united Hispanic lands is simply ridiculous, why should we support it, then?
With Habana in our hands, it is time to integrate our fellow brothers into the Federation

Spain has won in the Colombian wars of independence and now occups large lands on our continent. It is our duty to 'free' the Colombians and destroy the few influence the Spanish could have in our demesne !

Spain has won in the Colombian wars of independence and now occups large lands on our continent. It is our duty to 'free' the Colombians and destroy the few influence the Spanish could have in our demesne !

Spain has won in the Colombian wars of independence and now occups large lands on our continent. It is our duty to 'free' the Colombians and destroy the few influence the Spanish could have in our demesne !
Proclaim Yourself the Emperor of all the Colombia

The Bolivar's experiment ended during the Congress of Andagoya that had to be abolished because of large seccessionist tendencies. The National Dictatorship took power and managed to stabilize Gran Colombia a bit. If you want to regain the lost authority of non-Mexican lands you have to show your power and crown yourself as the first Emperor of the Colombian Empire.

The Miranda's experiment failed. But with enough maneuvering we have managed to unify the former lands of the Northern Federation. Democracy is not the way. Will you accept the crown of the first Emperor in the Amerigas? Unify through power!
The Veracruz Plan may have failed but we have achieved complete dominance over the rebels. It is time to crown our glorious leader emperor of Gran Colombia and free our southern brethren !
Create the National Dictatorship of Gran Colombia
The Miranda's experiment failed. But with enough maneuvering we have managed to unify the former lands of the Northern Federation. Democracy is not the way. Unify through power!

Under the leadership of your dynasty the First Empire flourishes. Now you have the option to call another council to recreate the constitution and unite all the people of the Colombian Confederacy in freedom and democracy.
With the dismantlement of what was Gran Colombia we are in the position to take back Mesoameriga !
Before taking Mexico we should secure the Lusitanian lands, then we can march on Mexico
It is time to take back Mexico City to end once and for all the ideas of an independent Latin America !

Competition between Mexico and Nova Lisboa was fierce for the colonization of the territories north of Lusitania. Ultimately most of the settlers came from Mexico and now that Lusitania is independent they could prove to be a fifth column in the case of a war against their Southern neighbour. Thus it has been proposed to relocate them in Tejas and Santa Catarina amongst the local Castillian-speaking community where they could be better controlled.

The territories of Dine Bikeyah were first explored by the Dong-guo city states that called the area Laofeng. But now we control the area, we can erase these Chinese names from the maps and call these lands as the Lusitanians always did : Rio Vermelho
The Colombians renamed lands that our ancestors had discovered first. Now that we control the area, we can force the other powers to use the real name of this region : Laofeng
Missing localisation. Please report to Divergences' developer.
Missing localisation. Please report to Divergences' developer.

The Draft of the Constitution may have failed but our Empire is now more stable than ever and steps have been made to further integrate the southern provinces into our social fabric. Long live Colombia united!
Found the Autonomous University of Mexico

Gran Colombia has been lacking a good educational system since the independence. Literacy has always been low and the archaic educational system controlled by the Church has not helped alleviate the situation. Our Minister of Education wants to fund an autonom and secular university in our capital, the first cornerstone of the new Colombian education system.

Ever since the 18th century, Dahomey has been paying tribute to the Oyo Empire to prevent war. Well we shall have no more of that, Dahomey shall stand on her own legs from now on. We are of course not as strong as them, which is why we've taken the liberty to get some foreign help with professional officers. Let us break free from the Oyo oppression!
The Ewe people west of our nation are ruled by unorganized tribes all fighting eachother, it is time for us to step in and claim the land in the name of order and the mighty flag of the elephant.
We've already embraced a part of the islamic culture and it taught us alot, maybe we should take it one step further and make Islam our state-religion?
We've already embraced a part of the western culture and it taught us alot, maybe we should take it one step further and make Catholicism our state-religion?
We've already embraced a part of the western culture and it taught us alot, maybe we should take it one step further and make Protestantism our state-religion?

The Savannahs to the north of us are unsettled and free for taking. The few people living there shouldn't be able to resist us and will hopefully just submit instantly. Let's send our troops there to claim the provinces for the great land of the flag of the elephant!

Raiders from the Akan lands have been pillaging our countryside for too long. Since the leaders of the Akan people claim that they are uncontrollable, we can only assume that they are incapable of properly ruling their people. It is time for us to take control of the region and stabilize it ourselves!
We can establish new schools throughout the country to better educate the populace and increase he literacy rate. Even though it's an expensive endeavour it will surely improve our research rate!

We can establish new universities in the country to educate our people into some of the brightest in Africa, and maybe even the world. Even though this will be very expensive it will make sure we get some of the finest academics!
We added the territory of Dine Bikeyah into our realm and we can declare our control of these lands uncontested.

The Duchy of Courland became a vassal to the Scandinavian Crown after the succesful conquest of Livland and the withdrawal of the forces of the Commonwealth. With our recent losses of control in the area, we need to strenghen it as a counter-move.

The last obstacle to our complete domination of the Baltic sea is the small state of Kourland. For too long, we have let them pursue a semi-independent policy and it is now time to reclaim their full integration in the kingdom
Time to move to the New World instead of staying in this place!
We have been left with only the Neu Kurland islands, it's time to welcome our new destiny!
We have risen as a power in our own right and we can claim the entirety of the Little Antilles!
The Polish colony lies a few miles from our coast and is only a burden for Warsaw. We could propose them a hefty sum to buy the island.

The Spanish once led claims to the whole Antilles but now they only control a few islands which serve nothing for them. With a good amount of money and persuasion we can make them integral parts of our principality
The Aragonese Crown possesses a few islands in the Caribbean but in exchange for some money it could easily be passed to us.
The island of MArtinique is the last of the Lesser Antilles we don't possess, a situation we can change with diplomacy and payments...

Gundershavn and Larshavn were the jewel of the Scandinavian crown until the Sudurhafeyjar were colonized and now they serve nothing for their empire, but they are very valuable to the Curonian people.
The island of Montserrat shares the same fate as Sant Jordi, that's why we must acquire it!
The Spanish Crown has no interest in keeping this little rock in their possession, we do.

The Dual-Monarchy colonized three little islands, commonly known as the Virgin islands as to have safe harbors between Amazonia and Plantagenia. With both colonies lost they have lost their purpose and lie in our sphere of interest.

Uniting the Kingdoms of England, Wales, Scotland and Ireland is the final step in our campaign of forging the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland. Thanks to our position, we are protected by seas in every direction. Perhaps, if we create something like the Royal Navy, we will be able to maintain naval supremacy and dominate the oceans. Now we can finally sing our new anthem - Rule, Britannia!
With an independent English government established, the Dual-Monarchy is forced to stop claiming the lands in their possession
The existence of an independent English state is a very insult to our Unity ! Let us reclaim what is rightfully ours now that the English aren't able to act on the international stage !
With an independent Occitan government established, the Dual-Monarchy is forced to stop claiming the lands in their possession
The existence of an independent Occitan state is a very insult to our Unity ! Let us reclaim what is rightfully ours now that the Occitan aren't able to act on the international stage !
With an independent Irish government controlling the Emerald Island the Dual-Monarchy will be forced to stop claiming Eire!
Ireland was lost but with our power firmly established in the islands we can easily reclaim what was once ours.
With an independent Scottish government controlling both the Highlands and the Lowlands Scandinavia will be forced to stop claiming the home of the Stewarts!
Scotland was lost but with our power firmly established in the Baltic we can easily reclaim what was once ours.
The end of the Anglois dream

Paris still claims lands in the British islands despite the fact that we control all our lands and have won against them countless times. It is time that the World recognizes the end of the Anglois ambitions !
With an English government in control of Northern England we can change the names of the streets and cities to proper English
With the Northern provinces brought into the fold we can rename the streets and cities to their proper names!
With the whole island controlled by England we can end the Anglois names on the island.
With the southern coast controlled by our government we can rename the streets and cities!
Restore the Solomonic Dynasty to the Imperial Throne

The Zemene Mesafint  was a period in Ethiopian history when the country was rent by conflicts between the Solomonic loyalist nobles and the usurper - Emperor Tewodros II. Both society and culture stagnated. Both society and culture stagnated. Religious conflict both within the Ethiopian Orthodox Church and with Ethiopian Muslims were often used as the pretext for the powerful to battle each other.
Oromo branch of the Solomonic dynasty was exiled two hundred years ago. Today, we can restore our rightful rule over these lands!
Recreate the Greater Sultanate of Adal

Ahmad ibn Ibrahim al-Ghazi the Conqueror was an Imam and General of Adal who invaded Ethiopia and defeated several Ethiopian emperors, wreaking much damage on that kingdom. With the help of an army mainly composed of Somalis, Imam Ahmad embarked on a conquest which brought three-quarters of Ethiopia under the power of the Muslim Sultanate of Adal during the Ethiopian-Adal War from 1529-43. But because of foreign white-skinned devils and their diabolic 'firearms', he was defeated and Adal fell with him. Now we stand at the gates of Gonder and he is finally avenged.

With the advent of railways in our nation, the idea has been suggested that our monarch tour the nation, traveling from city to city by train. Some urge caution, however, for such public appearances could provide assassins with the opportunity to strike in provinces that are simmering with rebellion.
A speech was made today,although the direct implications are obvious,whether or not it will go down in history shall remain to be seen.
We are a nation of growing power. It falls upon us to display to the so-called 'civilized' nations of the world that they cannot act with impunity. We will resist aggression in kind.
This is a chance to show the nations of the world our great state, as such our status has risen in the eyes of many. May the nation continue to prosper under your care.

As time presses on, so does the need to improve upon the ideals of the country. This new style of exhibition puts us above other countries around us, to show that we are progressing to a greater era of prosperity for our nation. Most countries in the rest of the world are pleased with this change of events.

The saying that 'Time waits for noone' holds true for nations as well. New ideas are spreading through your country like wildfire, many wish to hold a exhhibition to show the world these changes. This has improved your nation's image with the other countries.

New ideas are abound in the nation again, moreover the intellectuals of the nation has convinced us to 'donate' some money towards another exhibition. It was worth it in the end, as nations around flocked to see what our nation has been doing lately.

Into the pockets of our great nations the intellectuals descend into. For another exhibition has been called, and furthermore has shown the nations of the world that we are in the up and coming in terms of cultural development.

The organizers of this latest exhibition have assured us that it will be about the latest 'fad' that has struck the world. A lot of our nation's people agree with this as well. Well, other nations look at us in a better light, so it was worth it in the end. Right?
We shall put on the finest display of our culture the world has ever seen!
We shall put on the finest display of our culture the world has ever seen!
We shall put on the finest display of our culture the world has ever seen!
We shall put on the finest display of our culture the world has ever seen!
We shall put on the finest display of our culture the world has ever seen!
We shall put on the finest display of our culture the world has ever seen!
The 'Open Door' immigration policy meant that racial and cultural barriers to immigration were lifted, and began a wave of immigration in the New World that was previously unprecedented.
The proletariat state must guide the nation forward, using a plan that takes into account all our needs and does not rely on bourgeois greed.
The proletarian state has many enemies, ones that do not see the larger plan and how it benefits us all. We must locate them and keep them from harming our nation.
A grand display of our nation's scientific prowess. Let us bring the intelligentsia together in the capital, so that great minds may share ideas and advance our country's interests.
A grand display of our nation's scientific prowess. Let us bring the intelligentsia together in the capital, so that great minds may share ideas and advance our country's interests.

A grand display of our nation's scientific prowess. Let us bring the intelligentsia together in the capital, so that great minds may share ideas and advance our country's interests.
Let us display our nation's armed forces in the streets. We are a power to be reckoned with, and all the world will know it!
Those many immigrants that make their way to our lands will prove that they know what it means to be free.
The demand on our government's immigration system has been immense. We must come up with new ways to ensure that the rights of our new citizens are protected and recognized by the world.
The make-up of our country's population has changed so much and so rapidly that it is clear an effort must be undertaken to catalogue our population. Let us discover who is who in our nation.
A recognition has begun among our people of the basic fundamental rights that all humanity shares. This is the first step in becoming a truly modern civilization.
New ideas have come to our nation, and with them come new doctrines and principles that will change the foundations of how our people live.
Our state is changing, evolving from a simple government of bureaucrats and despots to a true organism of the state. We march into a modern era, one where new ideas will tranform the way we live.

We dream not only of an empire to span the world, but also of a cultural empire. Our people stand as civilized beings, and it is our imperative to bestow the gift of our knowledge upon others. Let the world know of our desires, for we shall find a place of prominence within it.
We have the means at our hands to be a nation of power and significance. We must exert that power responsibly, for now we are a true citizen of the world.

The world is changing rapidly, and bringing with it dangerous new doctines that threaten democratic principle. Whether our nation stands with those who desire freedom, or seeks a different path will be ours to decide and ours alone.
Turn on the function to change the National Value.
Turn off the function to change the National Value.
We Will Stand on our Own
Too long have we bent knee to unwanted foreigners. We must prove to them that our nation is a power to be reckoned with, and reject their influence within our nation.
Our beloved monarch does not fancy the current First Minister. Give him the sack and find another!
We are the Land of the Free and the Home of the Brave, a bastion of democracy in the world and a haven for its poor and dispossessed.
Sometimes, to maintain order in our nation, the police must be given powers that trascend civil liberties.

A chance is upon us. Do we approach the great power who has so much influence in $COUNTRY$, and ask them to intervene in our affairs? If we do, we stand a chance of freeing ourselves from foreign rule. We also stand to lose a great deal, as do they. We must proceed cautiously.
We have attempted diplomatic efforts to achieve our freedom, and been refused. Now our only hope is to demand our independence on threat of all-out war.
Greece was shattered and subdued many times and without us it would stay under the yoke of foreigners forever. But we have given independence to all Greeks! Let's celebrate this glorious moment!

Since the collapse of the great Majapahit empire our lands have fragmented into dozens of feuding nations. It is finally time that we unite our scattered, fragmented people into one great whole. Our great empire will even make the legendary Majapahit emperor Hayam Wuruk tremble in awe!

Our great empire continues to expand. We have absorbed all of our brothers from Taiwan to Papua. It is time we reclaim our ancestor's far flung colonies. The distant outposts of Polynesia, and Madagascar lie across the great Pacific and Indian oceans. Our glory will be unmatched in history if these lands are brought under our benevolent rule once again!

Our people have expanded farther than anyone could have believed. Our holdings spread half way around the world, and our factories are the envy of the all peoples. We have reached height undreamed of by our ancestors when they first set out to colonize these far-flung lands. Truly our empire is unmatched. Truly we are ascendant!
Our nation was placed between the rock and the hard place for centuries. Let's shake off these bad memories and form the nation of Romanians, the master of the Black Sea and the heir of the Dacians.
A united and free Romania will make a formidable and valuable ally.
Now that Romania has been formed, the time has come for us to join the motherland.
The Slavic peoples of the Balkans must be united under a single banner: ours. It is the only way to keep us free of rule from European powers.

After the weakening of the Byzantine Empire and the Bulgarian Empire in the middle and late 13th century, most of the Albanian territory became part of the Serbian state. Firstly, as part of Rashka and later as part of Serbian Empire. The southern part was governed by the semi-independent, Serbian ruled Despotate of Epiros. Along with the Serbian ruled Albania, there was also an Albanian state, the Principality of Arb?, and later the Kingdom of Albania. Thanks to these undisputed historical facts, we can claim Albania as a part of the Greater South Slavic Empire.
The Bulgarians are South Slavs too! What would the United Yugoslavia be without even uniting all Yugoslavian countries and lands! Let them join our rising empire and be free.
Reclaim the Territories of the Serbian Empire

The Tsardom of Serbia was a medieval empire in the Balkans that emerged from the medieval Serbian Kingdom in the 14th century and existed from 1346 to 1371. Stefan of Serbia became Emperor of Serbs and Greeks and ruled everything from Thessaloniki to Novi Sad. The empire died with the creator but its legacy lives on...

Serbia has entered a state of personal Union since we liberated them with our King ruling also over the Serbs. Now it is time to integrate them into our state directly to unify the South Slavic populations !
If the Slavic peoples of the Balkans are united under a single flag, they will be a far more useful ally then as separate and constantly warring states.

In $YEAR$ the ambassadors of the King of the Dual Thrones of England and France and of the Most Catholic King and Emperor of Bohemia and the Holy Roman Empire met in Salzburg. They decided to discuss a possible pact between these two European Empires. As a symbol of this meeting, the Salzburgers built a bridge over Salzach, representing their friendship.
The fate of the Republic of Venice was decided long time ago in Salzburg. Now we only have to fulfill the treaty.
With the final defeat of the House of Valois, we have gained enough  space to influence Italy.
La Serenissima was defeated by the Imperial Forces. According to the Treaty of Salzach we should allow Austria to gain full control of the Republican territories. So, what should we do?
The End of the Dual Monarchy
With all remaining Plantagenet core lands under the control of the revolution we can finally restore the land the Dual Monarchy occupied for so long to its rightful owners.\nTo freedom!
Occitania has always been closely associated with Northern France and the union of the two Republics can only be a benefit for the Revolution !
With our control over Toulouse, we are clearly the masters of the Midi !
The Alpine passes are heavily disputed between Italian and Provencal populations. With our state in control of these we can erase the pretentions of the Italians over these territories
Now that Italy is unified, the question of the Alpine passes is resolved !

Occitania is the part of our continental possessions that has always been the most difficult to control. But now we have eradicated the Valois threat and make efforts to integrate the minorities in our lands, we can make our rule accepted by the Provencaux !

Our rule in Ireland has been quite complicated since the final submission of the Irish lords during the Nine Years War (1598-1607). The King of the Dual-Monarchy is the Lord of Ireland but Irish mostly reject this title. With our policy of accepting minorities, we could crown the King in Ireland making them an integral part of our state !
With our focus on the British islands, we should take advantage of the Scandinavian weakness by forcefully conquering the last lands in the British islands that do not belong to us !

The Conquest of Scotland is recent and we have a hard time proving to the locals that we are their rightful brethren. But with our dominance in Europe and the Anglois dream pushing in the Lowlands and Highlands it might be possible to eventually settle the situation in Scotland.
With the Dual-Monarchy ending up winner in the Navarran Succession War we can collaborate with the Basque people and make them an integral part of the realm.

Education is becoming a rather central subject in Anglois politics. All politics except the most conservative are in favor of standardizing education, making it free and open to all children, to make them future responsible citizens. The main problem of this law is that the question of languages has not been settled yet.
With the growth of our power we no longer need the contact with the colonial ports of the European Great Powers. Perhaps we could ask them to relinguish their claims on that territory?
With the growth of our power we no longer need the contact with the colonial ports of the European Great Powers. Perhaps we could ask them to relinguish their claims on that territory?

The Doge has been unable to take back the mainland. The war which erupted a while ago is drawing on its end and we are winning ! Aragon and Bohemia have offered to mediate in our advantage the signature of a treaty which will push Venice out of Hellas.

We finally completed the conquest of classic Greece but we should push farther - to the City of Cities itself. Constantinopolis is the ultimate reward for the mighty Greece! But first we will have to isolate the vile Turks to force them to leave Europe once and forever...

The 'Megali Idea', the Great Idea, is the conception of a Greater Greek state encompassing all ethnic Greeks, including in particular the substantial Greek minorities living on the Western Coast of Asia Minor. We are today finally in a position to pursue it!

Since the council of Athens, many things have changed. We are now a democratic regime and we have created ties with our Greek puppet over the years. It is now the time to fully integrate them into our republic !

Since the repression of the independence movements, our Republic has seen many changes. Our government is now more democratic and the Greek have accepted our rule. It is now time to fully integrate them into our republic !

Following the War of Independence and the birth of Greek Nationalism, many Greek intellectuals wanted to create a university to educate the future elites of the country along with the common folk. Athens was chosen to host the first modern university of Greece, because of its past and its importance in the Greek national narrative.

There has been problems with Bulgaria because of East Macedonia which is a rightful Greek land but which they considered as a part of their heartland. Our dominant position in the Balkans allow us to end this squabble by making them recognize our claim to the area. We would also make an exchange of population so that Bulgarians live in Bulgaria and Greeks in Greece.

We have proven the superiority of the Greek people over the pesky Turks. The whole Greek coast is in our control and the City of the World's Desires is now completely safe from barbarian attacks! The Enosis is complete and we must now assimilate the people living in our country to ensure the purity of the Greek state.
Greeks have inhabited Epirus since antiquity. With the region now firmly under our control, proper Greek names can be restored to these lands.
With the Greek invaders driven out of Epirus, proper Albanian names can be restored to these lands.
Greeks have inhabited Thrace since antiquity. With the region now firmly under our control, proper Greek names can be restored to these lands.
With the Greek invaders driven out of Thrace, proper Turkish names can be restored to these lands.
Greeks have inhabited Byzantium since antiquity. With the region now firmly under our control, proper Greek names can be restored to these lands.
With the Greek invaders driven out of Istanbul, proper Turkish names can be restored to these lands.
Greeks have inhabited Ionia since antiquity. With the region now firmly under our control, proper Greek names can be restored to these lands.
With the Greek invaders driven out of Aydin, proper Turkish names can be restored to these lands.
Greeks have inhabited Nicaea since antiquity. With the region now firmly under our control, proper Greek names can be restored to these lands.
With the Greek invaders driven out of Hudavendigar, proper Turkish names can be restored to these lands.
Greeks have inhabited Pontus since antiquity. With the region now firmly under our control, proper Greek names can be restored to these lands.
With the Greek invaders driven out of Pontus, proper Turkish names can be restored to these lands.
To preserve our position in the Bay of Biscay we need to extend our territories to the north.
With the growth of our power we no longer need the contact with the colonial ports of the European Great Powers. Perhaps we could ask them to relinguish their claims on thst territory?
With the growth of our power we no longer need the contact with the colonial ports of the European Great Powers. Perhaps we could ask them to relinguish their claims on thst territory?

Our domination of the German areas is now beyond contest - for the first time in a millennia, the German people are united under a flag, ours! Let us proclaim the Greater German state, and take our rightful place as leaders of Europe!

The Holy Roman Empire could have been the greatest power of the continent if it had been united. The previous emperor tried to centralize the various principalities during the Revolution but the Great German War forced him to withdraw its claims. But now we are strong enough to try the adventure once more and this time, maybe establish a Reich that will last a Thousand Years !
Despite our efforts, the princes of the Empire did not accept our claim. We defeated them and we can rightfully be recognized Kaiser by the Germans ! Ein Reich, Ein Deustchland !
Form the Confederation at the Elbe

The dream of reunifying the German lands under our dominion is now forfeit. The revolutions and the rise of German nationalism have provoked an immense opposition to the unified Reich. However we hold special ties with the Elbian people and if we could bring the North German lands under our protection we could annex the princes of the north and govern the Elbians as equals to the Bohemians
Although Prussia was never part of our sphere of influence, the lands we ahve conquereds are still predominently inhabited by Germans. We can thus add them to our Realm
The Elsass lands have been out of the HRE since the first Burgundian wars. Predominantly inhabited by Rhenish people, we can add this area to the glorious Reich !
With our state controlling most of the Rhine region we have gained the support of the locals! Fur die Vaterland!

Our quest towards the integration of Germany has seen our state gaining the control of many territories in North Germany. With our hold secured on these areas we can surely gain the approval and cooperation of the locals!

Our quest towards the integration of Germany has seen our state gaining the control of many territories in South Germany. With our hold secured on these areas we can surely gain the approval and cooperation of the locals!
With our extensive rule over the South African territories you can claim the title of Lord Protector of Greater Griqualand.

The decisions to release vassals will be hidden again.
