The Ottomans are no longer capable of defending the Holy Cities! We will claim this title and our rulers will protect Mecca and Medina for the glory of Allah!

After the defeat of the Valois dynasty in the Hundred Years' War and the following annexation of their holdings, Provence became their last stand. But thanks to the Valois effective marriage policy, they quickly established control over the Duchy of Tuscany and the County of Ferrara. This was seen as a disturbance of power balance not only by Guelphs and Ghibellines, but even by the Crown of Aragon. The following war between the Valois Coalition (Provence, Genoa, Tuscany, Ferrara) and the Alliance of Naples (Aragon, the Papal States, Milan) led to the end of the Valois expansion in Italy. As the result of the war, their Italian holdings were confiscated and their relatives were expelled from Italy. Also, the annexation of Corsica by Aragon led to its complete control over the West  Mediterranean trade and the beginning of the decline of the Genoan Republic.

Even now that we are king of Italy we can't forget our claims in France. Our state is the reunion of many cultures, the French and Occitan having the same rights than the Italians we have united. We can't establish a Dual-Monarchy of France-Italy for now but we could claim the Mediterranean provinces of the usurpers.

Occitania is under our complete control. The dream of expelling the Plantagenets from our homeland is closer than ever. Let us retake the lands of France and be recognized as the true kings OF France. Montjoie St-Denis !

The kingdom of France has been reclaimed. However we can't present us as the sole king of Italy or we will face unrest from the population. We can establish a Dual-Monarchy like the Plantagenets, ruling both French and Italians. Long live Transalpina.
Our control of France is complete. We can now force the usurpers to come to negotiations and cede all the territories of the mainland to the rightful King of France.
Renew the War of the French Throne

After the defeat of the Valois dynasty in the Hundred Years' War and the following annexation of their holdings, Provence became their last stand. But thanks to our expansie efforts, Provence is now strong enough to stand strong against the English usurpers.
We have reclaimed Paris from the Plantagenets and can now make it our capital.
We have reclaimed Paris from the Valois and can now make it our capital.
While Bretons were not an integral part of the Capetian kingdom we have expelled the usurpers from this land nonetheless. We have a tradition of multiculturalism so it's normal to accept them too

The liberal republic of Etruria has been reduced to ashes with the King in France reclaiming his inheritance of Tuscany. But the duchy of Lucca has not accepted our renewed role in the area, proclaiming being freed from any feudal links toward us. While it is an obscure claim, we could always press it to strengthen our rule in Italy...

The Holy Crown of Hungary, the very embodiment of our state is in the hands of the Bohemian Kings who still like to pretend they are claimants to the throne. Alas for us no Hungarian King can be considered truly worthy of ruling until he has been crowned with the Holy Crown of Saint Stefen, first King of Hungary. Now we can ask the Emperor to give us back the Crown but it will likely come with demands?
With Prague under our control we can retake the crown of Saint Stefan.
With Budapest under our control we can force the Hungarians to concede defeat and return Slovakia to us.

Uniting Iberia was one of the ambitions of medieval monarchs of the Iberian peninsula. Sancho III of Navarre and Alfonso VII of Le? and Castile both took the title Imperator Totius Hispaniae, meaning "Emperor of All Hispania" centuries before. But with the rise of the Dual Monarchy in the East it was too dangerous for Castille to extend its territories and instead of the planned union with Aragon, the Kingdom of Hispania was created by merging the crowns of Castille and Portugal. With our control of the former Aragonese lands of Catalunya we can proclaim the Iberian Union. But the question is: Will the Catalans accept our rule?
To really become the Iberian Union we have to integrate the lands of the Basque people into our country
The Catalans nay have refused the unification at first but our important status in Europe has made them rethink about their previous actions

Our hold on Colombia is clearly a success. To raise our status among the European Powers and also in our colonies, we can crown our King, "Emperor de las Indias Occidentales" and thus give him a special place in the Royal Families of the Old Continent

Liberalisation has changed our society and the king no longer holds the same power as his forefathers. Our Prime Minister has presented us with a new proposal : grant home-rule to the colonies and create a Commonwealth grouping the metropolis and its colonies while crowning the sovereign in each Colombian state. It will surely make Spain and Colombia enter a new age of cordial relations and democracy
Finally, we have taken back from the barbarian Westerners our imperial capital of Cusco! Let us establish their once more the capital of the glorious Inca realm.
An Empire of the Sun God

Thank Inti! Our brave armies have defeated the last foreigners and returned the control over our ancient lands to us. Now we should change the defense into charge! Let the Spanish taste the guns and cannons they tought us to make, let the unstoppable high-tide blow over their lands!

We have expelled all foreigners from beyond even the furthest reaches of the ancient empire. Even Pachacuti himself would be proud of our accomplishments! It is time we work towards reintigrating the mestizo peoples back into our empire.
The peoples of the Indian sub-continent must be united under a single banner: ours. It is the only way to keep us free of rule from European powers.

From the Indian Ocean to the Deccan Plateau, along the mighty Narmanda and Krishna, let us reclaim the mantle of Asoka the Wise and Adi Shankara. Our might, courage,  and discipline have united this land once again!

From the Hindu Kush to Sri Lanka, along the mighty Ganges and Indus, let us reclaim the mantle of Asoka the Wise and the Great ancient empires. Call it Bharat, Hindustan or Dravida, today we have unified the whole subcontinent as one. Such a feat has not been acomplished since the time of Asoka the Great!

The conquest of Punjab was fierce but the lack of leadership amongst the Panjabis after the death of Ranjit Singh allowed us to take control of many territories along the Indus. However the occupation is harsh and expensive with the Panjabis more numerous that all the Afghan tribes... But if we can take all of Punjab, maybe a new path could emerge for the Sadozai, and maybe they could enter the Indian game ....

Bengal has been a province of our Empire since its conquest by Akbar the Great in 1576. The Nasirid governors took advantage from our troubles to proclaim their independence and become Sultans but once the area will be in our hands, none will deny us our legitimacy.
The Empire has regained the upper hand in the peninsula but it is far from its old standing. It is time to bring the Thai and the Champas under our leadership to regain pre-eminence in the region !

With the submission of both Thais and Champa we have regained the size of our ancestors empire. But we can't stop now ! It is time to spread our culture and dominion to the Burmese and the Viet and become the sole leader between India and China !
Become the Shield of the Levant

Now when we have risen in status in the eyes of the Europeans, we can start proclaiming our own imperialistic claims. We are now able to announce our right to be the true liberators of the Arabic people and protectors of the Levant.
With the fall of the Ottoman Empire our country was formed by an independentist Ottoman general. Iraq became an union of Persians and Iraqis - that is a dream we ought to pursue!
By establishing a dominant position on the Italian peninsula, we can secure a national homeland for our people by proclaiming ourselves the motive power of a unified Italian state.
We have managed to gain control of the City of Cities. Under your leadership, nothing can stop our nation now!

The people under the government of the Serenissima have distinguished themselves from their Italians brothers because of their ties with the East. But now that Venice is in the hands of the Italian Nation, it is our duty to fully integrate them into our national fabric

The Italian Irredentist movement strove for the transfer to the Kingdom of Italy of all territories in the immediate vicinity of the Kingdom which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Austrian lands in Italy proper, but it also meant territorial ambitions further into Dalmatia, and Austria.
With the downfall of Aragon as a Great Power we have gained a very good possibility to fill the power vacuum in Italy through helping the Grand Duchy of Savoy to gain the Iron Crown.

The evil imperialist swines decided to cut their knives through our country and create borders of their own. People of Italy, here me calling! We shall unite and free our brothers in one glorious revolutionary march! For Freedom!

With the recent flourishing of Liberal ideas, the time is ripe for us to unite Italy. We shall call a council of Italian states to further the cause for a united Italy free of foreign influence. If the council is successful, we will be able to bring Italy into this new age of Liberalism and Industry.

Germany was the heart of the Revolution but alas the old Republican flame is nowhere to be seen across the Alpes. Our Republic has the duty of helping our fellow revolutionaries to have a solid ally in the North! We need to pay caution though since it will surely not be to the liking of Burgundy and Bohemia...

Venice has benefited from most of its history of being an island. But the changes of our modern world and the advance of the railways have rendered Venice quite isolated from other urban centres. We could boost immigration by creating a bridge linking the City of the Doges to the rest of Europe.

Many urban centres underwent great transformations in the XIXth century to improve hygiena and salubrity along with building the necessary facilities for the modern life. Venice is in fact in dire needs of a great restoration, aimed at negating the problems of being an island city, surrounded by water and marshes. Some of our monuments could also be improved to reflect our international standing.

The Arsenal of Venice was the biggest shipyard in Europe for centuries, helping Venice to secure the Mediterranean with its galleys. Nowadays the days of the galleys are over but we could change the Arsenal into a Modern Shipyard, helping us to secure the Mediterranean and our overseas possessions!

The Colony of Athesia and Eleuthera has had a complicated relationship with the metropolis. It was thanks to Venice that settlers were defended from the Seminole tribes and could develop the peninsula and the archipelago to its current level but the need for reform was not acknowledged and insurrections tore the trust between Athesians and Venice. However our continued hold on Athesiahave allowed us to make our rule accepted by the locals.

Dalmatia was the first target of expansion of the Republic in the XIIth century, and Venice has held onto it for despite the various Turkish wars. Recently the independence of Illiria had led to increased nationalism from the Croatian inhabitants but despite this our rule has been confirmed.
The Korean rebellion is finally crushed and our peaceful rule over the peninsula may continue.
With Korea fully under our control, we can now enforce peace with Japan.
The Koreans and their allies defeated us last time, but now that we are better prepared it is time to resolve the issue once and for all!
With our expansion being so successful, we might persuade the Manchus to give up some of their territory without bloodshed.
As we plan to continue our colonisation efforts in the north, we should seize direct control over the Ainu territories.
The Man in the High Castle

The Chinese colonists founded the Dong Guo federation long time ago and since then it has developed into a full-fledged country. But somehow they stand in way of establishing total control over the Pacific.
Our relationship with the Hawaiian government has borne fruit. They have asked to become a part of our nation.
Japan now controls the archipelago, and our modern administration will get rid of Gaijin names and change them accordingly.
Japan now controls Formosa, and our modern administration will get rid of Gaijin names and change the island accordingly.

Our expansion has given us the rich lands of Manchuria. Their goods will be very important for our industry but the numerous local population could resist us. Let us establish a puppet state under the rule of a Manchu prince which will allow us to better control the local population.

The frozen Seihoku lands would be interesting to exploit but the lack of population and the unwilligness from our citizens to move there does not allow us to benefit fully from it, worse, these lands cost us much. We could create another Co-prosperity sphere member by 'civilizing' the Yakut tribes and then grant us sovereignity over all the inland Seihoku lands we possess.
Proclaim Yourself the Khan of Khans
Our nation, our pride - union of the Kazaks and the Uzbeks. Let the steppe eagle fly to the future, full of glory, power under Your leadership.
The Grand Duchy of Lithuania was one of the mightiest Eastern European nations. It became a part of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth. With its fall she can rise again.
After centuries of foreign oppression, the Baltic people are now united under our flag. Let us proclaim the Livonian Confederation, the state of all the Baltics citizens!
Restore the Macedonian Rule over Greece

In the classical era, Macedonians managed to gain control of Greece. But their empire was trashed and Macedonia subdued. Now when we have managed to reconquer what is rightfully ours, we can reform the empire of Philip of Macedon?

Alexander the Great, son of Philip, managed to conquer everything between Athens and far-away India. With our rise among the Great Powers of the world, we can start thinking about rebuilding it  - starting with the conquest of the Asia Minor.
Thanks to our friendship with our northern neighbors, we are now able to abandon our absurd Greek roots and enter the land of future - South Slavia!

The Conference of Naples of 1824 had given to our King the assent of both Greeks and Bulgarians to rule over Macedonia, and many in the assembly had hoped that Macedonia could also free the rest of Greece. Now an upstart rule in Athens and it is the duty of the Makedonias House to end this petty kingdom and unify Greece!
We should spread our greatness across all of northern Arcadia.
We should spread our greatness across all of eastern Arcadia.
We should spread our greatness across all of southern Arcadia.
We should spread our greatness across all of western Arcadia.

The Venetian colony of Athesia is located on a major strategic point. The port of Rialto watches most of ships passing through the Athesian strait and thus controls the traffic going in and out la Baie de Nouvelle-France. Since Venice has been declining lately, it might be the occasion to acquire this territory in exchange of some money
Despite our generous proposal, Venice has not let Athesia go. Now it is time to revert to force and to show them that one does not treat us like a minor power ....

With our control over Athesia established, it is time to turn our eyes south. The island of Habana is the only colony that did not join Gran Colombia during the war of independence. It is one of the last Spanish holdings in the New World and it holds a strategic position. To be free from any intervention or disruption of commerce in the Gulf of Mexico, we must control the island. It will require however a large amount of cash and even that will not bind Spain to give Habana...
Scandinavia still holds the archipelago they called the Islands of the South consisting of Righavn and Ayiti. Buying these islands would strengthen even more our position in the Caribbean

Burgundy still holds the island of Eendrachtsland in the Caribbean. This little island does not present an importance as great as Habana or Ayiti but it would improve our standing in Arcadia even more if we acquired this island.
We have lost the Falkland Islands to the Scandinavians and no one objected their seizure. But now they are not recognized as a Great power anymore we could offer to buy the islands for a hefty price

This war has shown us something. The former Spanish colonies united under the same flag are a threat to our influence in Arcadia and Ameriga. Some in our government have suggested that we make Gran Colombia dissolve itself in little states easier to control and manipulate. Thus there will only be one power in the New-World, us.
With our position secured in Northern Arcadia we can occupy the lands we claim in the West !

The Kaiganese colony has always claimed the remote Takikawa region as her rightful lands and with Odensmark and Tangwan falling under the control of other powers it might be wise move to take this region too.

The remote area of Takikawa was discovered by the Kaiganese at the beginning of the century but its remoteness and lack of ressources has left it empty. But now that all nearby territories are colonized it might be better for us to settle that territory!

Kita Kaigan is the neighbour with whom we share the most, a lot thanks to our common Asiatic origins. The Kaiganese though are too little and weak to protect themselves so it is better if we just annex them and integrate them.
Force our rule over Ciudad de Mexico
Because of the massive failure of the aftermath of the Independence Wars, the people of Mexico lost their unity. Shall the Mexican Eagle rise again?
We can abandon the idea of united Gran Colombia and instead focus on the integration of natives living in our lands.
Our dominant position among our cultural brethren puts us in a position to form $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$.
Our colonies in the East Indies are becoming a true part of the country. We must create the proper structures, so that they stand on par with our other national states.
Now that we have taken possession of this East Indies colony, we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.
Our colonies in the East Indies are becoming a true part of the country. We must create the proper structures, so that they stand on par with our other national states.
Now that we have taken possession of Christiania, we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.
With the Scramble for Africa launched the colony of Terra d'Oro should be formally organized to better rule over our African territories

We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure, as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule-- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators, of course.
Now that we have taken possession of this African colony, we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.
We have now obtained a dominant position over the north German states - it is time to complete this, to better pursue the greater goal of German unity.
For ages we've been dukes. Today, with the world recognizing us a greater power and Bremen secured, we shall proclaim the Kingdom of Hanover and lay our claim on all the German coast !

The county of Frisia, close enough to Burgundy to be threatened by and close enough the sea to fear Scandinavia, still managed to survive for centuries. The Burgundian conquests left Frisia divided, but now, Frisia will be one !
With our control over Westfalen we are able to elevate our country to the Grand Duchy of Westfalen.
Now that we defeated our former master Burgundy and acquired land on the other bank of the Rhine, we can proclaim the Kingdom of Rhineland !
A nation emerged on the other bank of the Rhine, calling itself the Rhineland. We can join them, as we occupy the other bank.
The Rhineland is a powerful and wealthy region. However, we only own a small part of the river that gives us our name. We must claim and secure all the Rhine, from the sources to the Rhine Delta !
A nation emerged on the other bank of the Rhine, calling itself the Rhineland. We can join them, as we occupy the other bank.
Batavia is under our control. Now is the time to sit down with our former colonial masters and work out a peace deal that will see it transferred back into Javanese hands.

The time has come for our people to stop clinging to ancient tradition. We must look to the nations of the west, and embrace their technology, if we are to retain our independence and our place in the world.
For too long have we looked to the nations of the west. We reject their ways and their superiority, for our are now and always have been best for us.
Our march towards civilization and matching any imperial nation with our ingenuity continues. We shall not be left behind!
We will not allow our nation to be overrun by the western imperialists. We are strong, united, and shall remain such. Against all odds, our nation shall endure.
Every citizen in our nation exists to serve, towards the greater good. It is only by acting in unison that we can hope to preserve our nation in the perilous times to come.
We move forward, but as a single people with a singular purpose. We shall not succumb to discord and revolution. Unity is our only hope of greatness.
We move forward, but as a single people with a singular purpose. We shall not succumb to discord and revolution. Unity is our only hope of greatness.
Our nation is wealthy and our people prosperous. This is and always shall be our greatest strength.
Our nation is wealthy and our people prosperous. This is and always shall be our greatest strength.
Ours is a great and powerful nation, possessing freedom and strength that other nations can only envy. We shall boldly stride into the future, where our greater destiny awaits.
Ours is a great and powerful nation, possessing freedom and strength that other nations can only envy. We shall boldly stride into the future, where our greater destiny awaits.
Our nation is strong, our borders inviolate. We shall march into the future together, humbly accepting the knowledge that our nation is the envy of the entire world.
Our nation is strong, our borders inviolate. We shall march into the future together, humbly accepting the knowledge that our nation is the envy of the entire world.
In our country, all men are created equal. It is time we fully embrace that maxim and throw off the shackles of iniquity.

Ours is a nation where all men are free to do as they wish, to advance their lot in life and achieve the greatness they were born to. This is our highest virtue, and the source of our nation's strength.
Our culture is astounding. Our military might is unparalleled. Our industry is dazzling. Soon the rest of the world will know of our might, and shake as we step onto the wider stage.
Ours is a wealthy nation filled with industrious, driven people. Each man pushes himself to do better, for the betterment of all.
It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of equality and social fairness above all else.
It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of liberty and personal freedom above all else.
It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of force and military power above all else.
It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of law and order above all else.
We defeated our enemies and are now the only dynasty ruling in Persia. We're now in position to claim the prestigious title of Shahanshah, the King of Kings !
With the conquest of Persia, Khorasan and Mesopotamia, our great dynasty can now restore the Iranian Empire of Cyrus the Great. Long live the Shahanshah- the King of Kings!

Kerman is the last territory held by the heirs of Timur in Persia. The Qajar and other vultures have challenged the claims of the rightful Shahanshah but now we have retaken Khuzestan from the Iraqis we can make them acknowledge our prominence !

The Temperance League, bold from many perceived victories against the uses and abuses of alchohol in our nation, are lobbying political decision makers to enact a nation wide ban on the sale, use and possession of alcoholic beverages. While opponents argue that prohibition threatens to turn the alcohol market into a lucrative business for organized crime, the Temperance League, on the contrary, argues that alcohol is in fact the root cause of many social ills, not least of which is, indeed, crime.
Some say that our nations's experiment with the outlawing of alcohol has gone on for too long, and argue that it should be abolished.

While our government has for some time maintained a central bank, some voices within the economic debate have begun arguing in favor of monopolizing the issuing of currency to a strict government prerogative. Proponents argue that this will lead to an increase in economic stability, while opponents see it as a fundamental breach of the freedom of trade.

The idea of Woman's Suffrage increasingly gained traction in Western society throughout the 19th century. First advocated in the writings of early liberal philosophers, such as England's Mary Woolstonecraft or John Stuart Mill, the idea and ideology of Woman's Suffrage gradually developed, as the century wore on, into a coherent ideology in its own right: Feminism. The experience during The First World War, of women working in factories, and other jobs previously reserved for men during peacetime, is often said to have been a crucial pivot point in securing Woman's right to work, vote, and, in other fields of society, achieve legal equality with men.
We must unite the Rajput people under a single flag, to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.

We have been humiliated again and again by the Incan savages. They have managed to conquer half of our great nation. Their atrocities cannot go unpunished! It is time we beat them back and reclaim our great nation!
We have managed to unite the former Spanish colonies in Ameriga. We can now proclaim the state of Granada.

When the Cree people mixed with the Chinese of Qingqiu and Vinlandic Scandinavians, a new race was born - the Rohnnst. They traded with the colonizers and after long and extensive contact with them they formed a proto-state in the middle of the wild Arcadian plains and forests. But the march of civilization is endless and they have to make a decision today. Will they accept our hegemony?

When the Cree people mixed with the Chinese of Qingqiu and Vinlandic Scandinavians, a new race was born - the Rohnnst. They traded with the colonizers and after long and extensive contact with them they formed a proto-state in the middle of the wild Arcadian plains and forests. But the march of civilization is endless and they have to make a decision today. Will they accept our hegemony?
Our policy of integrating the native peoples of Arcadia in our state must extend to the Rohnst who are closer to us than most of the other tribes !

The Iroquois people are numberous in the Great Lakes region. We have had a mxied relationship with the old Confederation but with steps taken to integrate the tribes into our social fabric we can make them accept our rule

The Algonquin tribes are the second largest native people in Vinland behind the Iroquois. Despite being organized in small tribes, they have acquired a common conscience over the years because of the colonization of their lands. With our policy towards the natives hinted at collaboration we can negotiate with them to make them full Vinlandic citizens

The Great Plains of Arcadia are inhabited by the Sioux people, divided between the Nakota, Lakota and Dakota tribes. Their territory is challenged by many different states and we could enforce our claims by making the Sioux full citizens of our country.

The Cherokee, or Tsalagi in their own language, are the Native people with whom the Dual-Monarchy had the most contacts. The Kingdom of Plantagenia ended their independence but the Cherokee never forgot their very culture. Proposals have emerged in Nouvelle-Orleans to make a special Cherokee act that would grant full citizenship to the tribes from the Montagnes Enfumees.

The Cunmin tribes were the prime trade partners of the early Dong Guo city states and differentiated themselves from the many other Native tribes the Chinese settlers met by living in villages hence their name which mean "Villagers", more commonly known as Pueblo because of Spanish conquistadors. As the Federation expands east it controls more and more of their territory and some of the politicians of Sanbao have suggested that we should grant them full citizenship to strenghten our rule on the Wild East.

Spanish colonization of Ameriga and Southern Arcadia integrated the Native elites in the colonial system granting nobility title to the most Hispanicized. But in the northern parts of Lusitania, the city social system did not exist and many encroachements between Lusitanian and Apache tribes erupted. With our control over the numerous Apache territories complete we can grant them citizenship and let them administrate thier territories in our name
Proclaim the Tsardom of all Russias
Our domination over the Eastern Slavs is complete, and the time has come to declare a single states of all the Russians. The Great Bear has finally risen, and now Europe shall fear us!

Our influence in Mongolia is such that we are in a position to pry the nation away from the Chinese and into our control. They would be our vassals, benefiting from protection against Chinese claims on their land.
If Russia is to become a great empire, we must determine how we are to deal with our strong neighbors.

In the early 18th century, Mikhail the Great made great efforts to modernize and strengthen Muscovy. We should honor and continue his efforts by building a great city on the Baltic and making it our capital. Nyenschantz isn't ice-free all year, but it's easily defensible and already somewhat populated. Furthermore, it would allow our a greater degree of control over our new Baltic subjects, which could very well make integrating them easier.

Rostov is located at the mouth of the Don River and has easy access to the Black Sea. If we are to focus on expanding southwards, it would make an excellent capital, giving us easy access to the entire Mediterranean and opening up many opportunities for trade, diplomacy, and expansion. We would also be able to exert greater control over recently incorporated steppe peoples, which could very well make integrating them easier.
As our (somewhat) close cultural kin, the Ruthenians certainly deserve full political rights within our empire.

While the Tatars have traditionally been our rivals and a barrier to Russian unification, some of them have taken up our cause and religion, including the Muscovite Temryukov dynasty. These "Russo-Kryashens", as they are known, are a sure sign that we will be able to earn the loyalty of our Tatar subjects.
The Tatars of Astrakhan are very similar to those in Kazan, although rather more of them are Muslim. It will not take much more effort to integrate them into Russia.

The Caucasus is full of small, bickering nationalities. Georgians are potentially useful to us for their legacy of Orthodox Christianity, and if we empower them, they may serve as a useful bulwark against Turkish aggression, or any other state that may arise in the Middle East.

We've been trading with the Estonians for quite a while. As long as we show some respect for their language and culture, we should be able to keep them from turning to Scandinavia or elsewhere for freedom.
Like the Estonians, we have interacted with Latvians for some time, and integrating them into our social fabric should be quite simple.

We can finish enforcing our hegemony over the Baltic by giving special consideration to the needs of the Finnish people. By doing so, we will create a strong and loyal buffer against any Scandinavian revanchism.

The Tsardom has competed with the Tatars for centuries and the areas along the Don and the Volga rivers have changed hands regularly. The current balance of power makes us a possible target of the Scandinavians through their puppet of Novgorod but should we rise again we could easily claim the Steppes as ours!
The Empire of Holy Russia is a natural successor of the Tsardom of Moscow. We shall use the newly-gained power to bring Mother Russia to its former glory.
The Empire of Holy Russia is a natural successor of the Tsardom of Moscow. We shall use the newly-gained power to bring Mother Russia to its former glory.
The Siberian plains were claimed by the Russian rulers since the times of Vladimir Atlasov and Danila Antsiferov. We have to keep our word.

Since the Boer Wars following the Great German Wars a new idea has spread amongst the Afrikaans people. More and more people are advocating for a new state to rise to unify the Boer States. This state will maybe be able to reclaim Kaap and maybe even threaten the European establishment
With the Cape Colony under our control we can form a true, united Boer republic-- one that at last will keep us from foreign domination and Burgundian rule.
This should never be read outside of a localisation file.

Our dominant position over the south and central German states is now firmly established. While it will still take time to unify all the Germans, today we can at last form a proper German kingdom - a stepping-stone to greater things!
The World of Divergences is vastly different from ours. If you aren't familiar with its history, you should read that piece of text
The World of Divergences is vastly different from ours. If you aren't familiar with its history, you should read that piece of text

The fragmented Hausa people are crying for a hero. They are begging to be united  under one banner. Will we be mighty enough to answer this call, and create an empire to match the greatest powers of our times? Will we be able to form the great Sokoto Caliphate - the mightiest power Sahel had ever seen?
The age of the steppe warriors is over. However, if we could unite the khanates of the European steppe, it would be a fitting tribute to their legacy, and a counter to growing Russian nationalism.

In order to survive as as a nation-state, we Tatars will have to give up our nomadic lifestyles. By encouraging aggressive demographic policies (fertility for everyone!) and especially developing our great cities, we can increase our population enough to prevent Russian incursions on our territory.

Cooperation between private industrialists and the military, on the issues of national defense and war policy, have led to the development of a particularly important web of connections, personal ties and acquaintances, with just an ever so slight hint of corruption, that can best be described as a Military-Industrial Complex. By furthering the goals and ambitions of these informal networks within our academia, we can boost industrial and military research, at the expense of navy and culture.

It has been said that the best way to get ahead in our country is to go via the naval schools. Much of our country's military and political elites have been educated navy men, or have served in the merchant marine. The navy's importance for a seafaring country like our own cannot be underestimated, and by promoting these groups and backgrounds politically, we can ensure that our naval technology will develop at an increased rate, at the expense, however, of other fields of research.

A cultural and ideological avantgarde within our country has, during the past years, been undertaking a long march through our academic institutions. By steadily working their way up the rungs of the academic ladder, these radical new ideologues are now in a position to completely subvert our academic institutions to better suit their ideological agenda. By supporting their cause, we can increase the speed of our cultural research, to the detriment, however, of other spheres of intellectual progress.

Our country has under the past years come increasingly under the sway of select cliques of people who have all been educated at the same, or similar, elite business schools and companies. By supporting these groups, we can ensure that our academia's focus lies where it matters: in the fields of commerce and industry. This change will, however, come at the expense of other fields of research.

Capital and government in our country have, for some time, been doing their utmost to weave between them an intricate web of personal relations, that has increasingly come to assume the forms of a symbiotic relationship of mutual dependence. By further promoting these connections between the public and private spheres of our society, we can vastly increase our technological progress in the fields of industry, at the expense, however of research in other fields.
Many within our academic circles feel that the present direction of our academia suffers from an undue bias, and that we should return to a more traditional academic profile.
The unrest in our country is growing. We are forced to recreate the Parliament.

The Tanzimat, meaning reorganization of the Ottoman Empire, was a period of reformation that was characterized by various attempts to modernize the Ottoman Empire, to secure its territorial integrity against nationalist movements and aggressive powers. The reforms encouraged Ottomanism among the diverse ethnic groups of the Empire, attempting to stem the tide of nationalist movements within the Ottoman Empire. The reforms attempted to integrate non-Muslims and non-Turks more thoroughly into Ottoman society by enhancing their civil liberties and granting them equality throughout the Empire.

The Tanzimat, meaning reorganization of the Ottoman Empire, was a period of reformation that was characterized by various attempts to modernize the Ottoman Empire, to secure its territorial integrity against nationalist movements and aggressive powers. The reforms encouraged Ottomanism among the diverse ethnic groups of the Empire, attempting to stem the tide of nationalist movements within the Ottoman Empire. The reforms attempted to integrate non-Muslims and non-Turks more thoroughly into Ottoman society by enhancing their civil liberties and granting them equality throughout the Empire.
With all of Greece and Bulgaria under our control we can once again claim those lands to be legitimately ours.
With all of Iraq and Kurdistan under our control we can once again claim those lands to be legitimately ours.

Since the successful rebellion of the Zahiri, Egypt has become a beacon of light in the Arab World. With Al-Quds under our control and the European Powers acknowledging our power we can safely proclaim ourselves the Protector of the Arabs and expel the Turks from the Mashriq !
Serbia is under our control. We have captured the forts along the Danube and penetrated deep into the Empire's territory. The Sultan will be forced to acknowledge our victory !
We have successfully taken Cyrenaica from the Egyptian rebels. It is time to integrate it into our country.
Ankara is home to the Turkish national movement, and a more defensible location away from European enemies.
Under the long oppression by the Ottoman Empire the Arabians suffered. Now we stand united against the enemies of Islam once again!
Project our Influence in Abyssinian Lands

Our Empire now stretches from Damascus to Tripoli, from Jerusalem to Mecca, from Ryiadh to Cairo. We can use our power and exert it over the weak kingdom of Ethiopia, that resisted many Funj invasions, but had to kneel before us.

Cairo was the capital of the Fatimid, Ayyubid and Mamluk caliphate from 969 to the 16th century when it was conquered by the Ottoman Empire that moved the center to Istanbul. Let's return the former glory to this ancient city!
We can take the Egyptian Desert.
We can take the Cyrenaican Desert.
We can take the Tripolitanian Desert.
We can take the Lybian Desert.
We can take the Nubian Desert.
We can take the Iraqi Desert.
We can take the Yemeni Desert.
We can take the Omani Desert.
We can take the Nejd Desert.
We can take the Hail Desert.
We can take the Jordan Desert.
We can take the Middle Desert.

Greater Syria encompasses many cultures : the Arabs may be the more numerous but the Levant has several communities due to its status of crossroads. Currently the Druze and Syriac minorities are discrimanited despite them being an integral part of the Syrian people. We can remedy to this problem but it will alienate the most religious.

The biggest minority in our state is the Christian Chaldean community, often named the Assyrians. Kurds and Assyrians have a long past of infightings, more often because of the Kurds than the latter. But as the rule of law becomes even more important in Kurdistan relations between both communities have become to improve and it seems that the Assyrians could really become an integral part of the new Kurdistan.
The Sahara is immense and empty and forms a perfect frontier for our nation. However we should claim it before other nations take control of it !
With our control of Morocco complete we should claim the western Sahara lands before any imperialists try to take control of these lands !
With Maghreb under our control, we have to take control of Tripolitania to protect our brothers from the Imperialists !

We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure, as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule-- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators, of course.
Now that the Magrebi tribes were defeated we should reorganize our Maghrebi territories in a new colony. We must create the proper structures, so that it stands on par with our other national states.
Now that we control Tripoli, we should reorganize our African territories in a new colony. We must create the proper structures, so that it stands on par with our other national states.
Following a local uprising in 1897 France, who had long held Madagascar in its sphere of influence, formally deposed the Royal House and annexed the Island.
With the Burmese under our influence, we can attempt to annex the entire coast of Burma. They might not agree peacefully, though...

The Steppes have seen the fall of many nomad empires : the Saka, the Xiongnu, the Mongols ... All have faded and are now only remembered in history. But the Steppes need a leader to unite them into a single state, not a Khanate a relic of the past, and who will protect them from Imperialism, be it from Europe or Asia!

The Manchus are closely related to our homeland. In fact if it were not for the petty Qing Empire they would have surely joined us. Japan has interests in the area and it is our duty to protect the Manchu from China and Japan alike. And an access to the sea would be interesting for our country ...
Form the United Provinces of Mesoameriga
The UPMA - one of the succesors of Gran Colombia - died as well. But we can ressurect on our path to the greater glory?
With our control over the Southern Island complete, we can now force the Maori to sign an unequal treaty with us
Our colonies in the Maori Islands are becoming a true part of the country. We must create the proper structures, so that they stand on par with our other national states.
We have taken the Maori islands and we can now reorganize the old colony of New-Zealand

The New-Zealand colony is recent and the Maori tribes still represent a large part of our population. instead of oppressing them we should guarantee the rights given by the treaty of Waitangi to better integrate them into our social fabric.

For many years our people have dreamed of going back to the Middle Kingdom. But as we can see know Zuharra has truly become the centre of culture like our old homeland. We can now claim the Mandate of Heaven and rule over our previous tributaries !
Even if our culture is the best one we have come to acknowledge the valor of the primary people of Zuharra. It is time to recognize them and integrate them into state.

The Maoris people were the first people the new Treasure fleets encountered when our kings decided to spread their dominion across the Austral Seas. Now that we control the Eastern Islands we can recognize our old tributaries as an integral part of our culture

The Melanesian people are spread across the Northern Islands predominantly on the one called Papua. We have established ties during the Era of Expansion and now we fully control the territory occupied by these people we can integrate them into our ever growing state

One thing has appeared to us over the centuries. We are the true deposits of Culture. Instead of trying to dialogue with our tributaries we should expand our way of life and bring them to civilization !

Lanfang occupies only a small part of the island of Po-Ni, also known as Borneo by the Westerners. It is our duty to civilize the whole island and its people so they don't end up under the boot of the imperialists!

The native people of Po-Ni, the Dayaks have better life conditions under our rule than under the Malays or the Westerners but it doesn't mean that they are our equal. With the development of our state we could improve their conditions and officially make them citizens of Lanfang!

With the Spanish having lost their international power, their Pacific holdings appear now difficult to administrate and incredibly expensive. Considering that our government's interests lie in increase our possessions in the Pacific, we should perhaps approach them with the notion of purchasing these islands for ourselves.

The Baastard or Griqua people are descendants from Boers mixed with the locals and who moved on to form their own communities like in their republic of 'Vryland'. They suffer many discriminations in our country despite the fact that they are civilized and speak a better Afrikaner than the Burgundian settlers around Kaapstadt. If we can rally a significant political force to support reform we could make them proper citizens of our state.
Due to the world being so generous towards less gifted nations of the world, we earn more fortune than we could possibly dream of. Maybe we should be less greedy?
While it is nice being generous and all but to be honest, the playing field should be even.
Proclaim the Selon Treaty null and void
With Spain falling out of grace, we do not have to abide by the rules set by the Treaty of Selon anymore.

The Quechua people inhabiting Granada have been pushing for reunification with the indigenous Incan Empire for centuries and often stage protests and revolts against our rule. But now with our power asserted amongst the powers of the World and our influence in the Incan Empire we can force the Quechua to relinquish any claims on our territory!

The federal nature of our state poses serious problems for maintaining order, with the various police forces underfunded by the local authorities, lacking proper training and squabbling over jurisdictions. The central government has proposed the creation of a Federal Force inspired by European methods, the Federal Gendarmerie which will be able to act over our whole territory as to severely hinder the rebellious elements of our population.

England has been reborn from the ashes but it isn't guided by the rightful King, ours who sits in Camelot. With our power we can claim the island for ourselves and impose our will on the English people!

Beornia has battled for centuries with the Mapuche and the Incas for the control of the south of the continent. Rather than limit ourselves to the uncivilized pampas of the south we can also claim the southern Incan provinces, cross the Andes and claim the Pacific!

The links between Porto Novo and Nova Lisboa are tenuous at best, and it is with great difficulty that people travel from one ocean to another in Lusitania. The advent of the railroads could alleviate this problem if we were to sponsor a company that would link the two cities and the two seas. It would moreover dynamize relations with Qingqiu in the West and the rest of Arcadia to the East.

The Slovenians are a South Slavic people, much like ours although their language is quite different from Croat. They are also Catholic, contrary to the Serbs or the Bosniaks. Making them accept our rule should not be difficult, even more so with the Austrian threat in the North.
Slovenia is now in Slavic hands and the claims of the Germans on our territory are forfeit.

The Croatians while not Magyar had enjoyed great rights under the personal union of the two kingdoms in the Middle-Ages. The Croatian Hungarian Settlement acknowledged the long-standing autonomy of Croatia within Hungary. It allowed the formation of a Croatian Parliament and gave seats to Croatian MPs in Budapest. With this compromise, we recognise Croatians as full citizens of our state.

The fate of Croatia and Hungary were linked for centuries following the personal union of the two kingdoms and the crowning of L?zl?I. Sadly the Croats preffered to create their own kingdom, distinct from old Croatia and thus distinct of the reborn Hungarian Kingdom. It is now time we made our own claims on Croatia and once again gain access to the sea !
We are independent but Gran Colombia still stands strong so it might be a better idea to join them.

The Dniester has never been a fixed border for the Romanian people with many Moldavians choosing to cross the river and establish themselves in various settlements. It is our duty to claim this territory to protect our brothers and increase our national territory.
Make Coptic Christianity the Official Religion in Transcaucasia
The Coptic minorities long have been oppressed in Transcaucasia. It's time to exert our power in Transcaucasia and put them in power so Transcaucasia religious policy is in unison with ours.

The Messipi is a crucial waterway for the economy of our country, vertebrating trade and transport on a south-north axis beggining in our capital, Nouvelle Orle?s, located on the delta. If we control direclty the upper course we will be able to extend our influence north-westwards, bringing a large territory in continental Arcadia under our control and pre-emting Lusitanian expansion into the area.

We now control most of the Messipi watershed, with only the lands far to the North inhabited by the Sioux resisting our rule. Although we already have relations with them through traders and missionaries, it is time to bring them closer into our fold, forcefully if necessary.

Thea area around lake Finnj? is divided between Rh?nst, Algonquin and Sioux tribes which are mutually hostile. For a long time we have mantained a policy of divide and rule to forward our interests, but now it might be time to directly occupy the area and establish formally our frontier with the R?nst polity further west.

In recent years reports from prospectors have shown region of Tj?in is rich in coal ore. Wrestling control of this land from the native Sioux tribes will allow us to establish coal mines and fuel our hungry industry

The territories to the extreme North-West of our frontiers are inhospitable and largely uncharted except for a few major landmarks reported by fur traders. Although mostly frozen wastes, occuppying this area around lakes Blasj? and Lillenhavet will give us control over large tracts of unclaimed land, ripe for prospecting.

For years, the vast and largely unexplored amazonian basin has drawn adventurers from all over our country, driven by a promise of fortune. Now that we have the technology to establish long-distance communication, using the waterways to transport personnel and supplies, we can finally occupy the amazonian hinterland and its riches before other powers do so.

The Grand Chaco lies on our eastern frontier, inhabited mostly by nomadic Guarani tribes. Although most of it is arid and unsuitable for agriculture, we have a formal claim on it since the 18th Century explorations by Burgundian missionaries, and we would to well to occupy it before other powers move in to encroach upon our frontiers.
The Azhou peninsula lies north to our lands. Controlling it would give us access to fertile lands for farming as well as a commanding position in the Torres strait, making it a strategic possession.

The region of Oodnatta is mostly arid and unsuitable for agriculture, but the areas around the South-Eastern lakes and the southern coast have a much milder climate, making them targets for the settlement of Zhourao pioneers.

The areas around Noongar and Kojonup represent the most fertile land in the western coast of the continent. Bringing them under our control will be an important step in our expansion westwards, before foreign powers establish colonies that might threaten the integrity of our celestial realm.
Establishing direct control over the Coomalong region will finally formalize our direct control over the entire seaboard of Zhourao. Heaven has led us west!
The climate in the region of Yolngu is harsh, but establishing premanent presence in the Northen coast would allow us to establish firmer trade links with Nusantara and its rich lands.

The Pitjantjatjara desert is the last remnant of untamed land in our realm. Although dry, inhospitable and sparsely populated, establishing direct control would allow Zhourao prospectors to look for valuable resources.

Motu Timu, the island south of our great realm, is inhabited by various fragmented Maori tribes. It is time to formally occupy Motu Pari, before any colonial power decides to enslave our brothers to the south!

Traditionally our Eastern border has been delimited by the Great Eastern Mountain Range, except for its southernmost section, where the native Pueblo people still control land west of the cordillera. Recent reports by prospectors have pointed out to the presence of coal ore in the region, which if we control directly could be used to build up our industry.

Although in the past Qingqiuan polities have seen the Great Eastern Mountain Range as the natural border of our realm, in recent years the great plains beyond to the west have become enticing avenues of expansion. Formalizing our claim to the area would allow us to exploit its resources and prevent Easterners from encroaching upon our natural frontiers.
With the Great Eastern Mountain Range now fully in our control, it has become time to move our frontiers westward and establish a buffer zone against Easterner agression.

The Baizehu region has been disputed for many years between us and the Rhonnst people, with neither side actually exercising direct control over the area. We must move first and establish a formal colony in the area!

Tangwan, the region immediately north to our northernmost settlements, has for many years attracted Qingqiuan settlers looking to participate in the lucrative fur trade. It might be time to formally occupy these lands, lest our competitors east or west steal our thunder.

The Baizehu region has been disputed for many years between us and the Qingqiu people, with neither side actually exercising direct control over the area. We must move first and establish a formal colony in the area!

Traditionally an area of conflict between our Rhonnst brothers and Sioux and Angolquin tribes, the Tjorin region is now being threatened by Vinlander expansionism. We must move quickly if we are to secure our borders against western agression.

Although sparsely populated, the Torsmark region is home to a significant Rhonnst population. We should establish firmer control of the area in hopes of deterring further western expansionism and exploitation of our kin.
Disables the -0,4 infamy modifier for Great Powers and the -0,2 infamy modifier for the rest of countries. Not thoroughly tested, use at your own risk.
